entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14 except minus 10 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14 except minus 10 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 7:20 PM CST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7 except plus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7 except plus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:20 PM CST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 14 except minus 6 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
